black_cards.text: After reading Stephen Hawking's latest theory of _____ I curled up into a corner and cried for three days straight.
Before Marilyn Monroe came along, Hugh Hefner wanted _____ as the first Playboy centerfold. Unfortunately for everyone, that deal fell through.
Damn it feels good to be _____.
Give me liberty or give me _____.
Whenever I feel lonely, I put on some Barry White, dress up like _____ and dance seductively in front of the mirror.
